did.abstract: Letters written while stationed at Jacksonville, Fla., and Havana, Cuba, to Florence Lytle of Jacksonville. Comments on army life and on the death of a friend, Jonas H. Lien, 1st South Dakota Infantry, who was killed in the Philippines.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Oscar H. Allen Papers, 1898-1899, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_section.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, December 2016.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Letters written while stationed at Jacksonville, Fla., and Havana, Cuba, to Florence Lytle of Jacksonville. Comments on army life and on the death of a friend, Jonas H. Lien, 1st South Dakota Infantry, who was killed in the Philippines.
